description: Try our easy to follow Egg Toasts With Roasted Tomatoes & Avocado recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Eggs on toast,Pescatarian,Roast,Low salt,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Quick & easy breakfast,Egg,Low sugar,Mother's Day,Halal,High protein,High fibre,Vegetarian,Tomato,Avocado,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Egg Toasts With Roasted Tomatoes & Avocado Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180oC. Line a baking tray with baking paper. Place tomatoes on tray and lightly spray with oil. Season with salt and pepper. Roast for 10 minutes or until just wilted.
Meanwhile, using a 7cm-diameter heart-shaped cutter, cut a heart from centre of each bread slice.

Spray a large non-stick frying pan with oil and place over a medium-high heat. Place 2 slices of bread and bread hearts in pan and carefully break an egg into each heart hole. Cook until eggs are starting to set, then carefully turn and cook other side until toast is golden and egg is cooked to your liking. Continue with remaining bread and eggs. Serve with the roasted tomatoes and avocado.
